title: Calories in Yuengling Beer
meta_description: Discover calories in Yuengling beer per 12 oz bottle, including carbs, protein, and other nutrients for informed choices.
assumptions: Yuengling Traditional Lager, standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by specific variety, brewing batch, and serving size. Check labels or brewery info when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Yuengling beer contains about 140 calories and 11 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Yuengling beer?
faqs.a: About 140 calories per 12 oz bottle of Yuengling Traditional Lager.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Yuengling beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 11 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Yuengling beer have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle; it's low in both.

faqs.q: Calories in Yuengling Light vs. regular?
faqs.a: Yuengling Light has about 110 calories per 12 oz, 30 fewer than regular.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Yuengling beer?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per 12 oz bottle.
